===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[defy]]; to [[appeal]]; to [[refuse]] to [[accept]]
#: {{zh-x|不服 判決|to not accept the verdict}}

#: {{zh-x|怎麼著[着]{zhāo}，不服 啊？|What, you still haven't given up? [contemptuous]}}
# to be not [[accustomed]] to
#: {{zh-x|水土不服|to be unaccustomed to the feel of the new place}}
